=====================================

**Government Tender Announcement: CCGS Cove Isle Winter Refit 2022**
=================================================================

**Procurement Summary**
-------------------------

Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC) invites tenders for the Winter Refit 2022 of the Canadian Coast Guard Vessel (CCGS) Cove Isle. This project involves a drydocking refit of the vessel at the contractor's facilities.

**Key Project Details**
-------------------------

*   Bidder's Conference: November 8th, 2022 at 10:00AM at CCG Base Amherstburg, Ontario
*   Optional Site Visit: November 8th, 2022 at 1:30PM at Coast Guard Base in Amherstburg, Ontario
*   Commencement Date: December 19, 2022
*   Completion Date: February 24, 2023
*   Vessel Transfer Costs apply to all bids for evaluation purposes

**Request for Proposal**
-------------------------

The contractor is required to carry out the following work:

*   Overhaul of the anchor windlass
*   Hull inspection, preparation, and coating
*   Overhaul of generators
*   Inspection of rudders and fuel, potable water, ballast, and sewage tanks

**Selection Criteria**
-----------------------

Bids will be evaluated based on the lowest price submitted.

**Sourcing Strategy**
---------------------

The procurement strategy is limited to suppliers along the St. Lawrence and the Great Lakes due to vessel limitations.

**Compliance with Trade Agreements**
---------------------------------

This procurement is subject to the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA) and exempt from the North American Free Trade Agreement (NAFTA) and the World Trade Organization - Government Procurement Agreement (WTO-AGP).

**Additional Requirements**
-------------------------

*   Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada
*   The Crown retains the right to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement

**Bid Submission Instructions**
-----------------------------

Bidders must submit their bids electronically through the Canada Buys website by November 29th, 2022 at 2:00PM Eastern Standard Time (EST).

For more information and to access the bid documents, please visit:

<https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/11/11/fe2d715ad271047e3032440537d2a10a/technical_data_package.zip> or contact Jayme-lynn Riopelle at (873) 354
